wikipedia_page.main: Michael Oluwaseyi Ayo (born 5 March 1989), known by his stage name Faith Child, is a MOBO and multi-award-winning British Christian rapper. He has released two chart-topping studio albums, Illumination in 2009, and Airborne in 2015.

link_mentions.page: List of Christian hip hop artists

response: In August, the group released "Forever Young", and in November, they released "Dance With Me", featuring Faith Child.
